description: This file contains categorized customer support messages used for sentiment analysis. Each category includes a short description and a list of example messages.

examples: App is working great, no issues.
Very happy with my internet speed!

neutral.description: Messages that are informational or inquiry-based
examples: Had to reset my router today.
Need some help with my billing info.
Where can I find my plan details?
Please update me on my ticket status.
Still no resolution to my issue!
Internet has been slow for days.
